author: Simon Denyer, Simon Denyer
title: Coronavirus: Japan continues to defy working from home protocol
description: A rigid work culture has left this country among the least prepared in the developed world to embrace the remote-working realities of the coronavirus age
content:
When it comes to working from home, Japan simply doesnt get it.
In the midst of a coronavirus epidemic, commuter trains in Tokyo are still pretty packed, and many companies are acting like nothings really changed.
This is a nation where you still have to sh… [+5332 chars]
